QUESTIONS

1) How many years of experience do you have with the following?

    • J2EE Development
    • .Net/C#
    • Tomcat

2) (If currently employed) Why are you looking for a new job?

3) Why did you leave your last job?

4) How much do you currently earn (Or what did you earn in your last position)?

5) What salary rate are you looking for to make your next move?

6) This job is based in Brampton, On are you willing/able to commute to this location?

7) How soon would you be able to start if a job offer was to be made?

8) What is the best phone number to reach you on during business hrs?

JOB DESCRIPTION

Title:  Senior Java/J2EE Developer
Location: Brampton, On
Duration: Permanent
Apply via email to: nick@gurulink.ca

              SENIOR J2EE/JAVA DEVELOPER

Our client is looking for senior Java/J2EE Developers with a solid background in C#/.Net technologies a successful candidate will have some of the following attributes;

• 6+ years in software development with relevant academic qualifications.
• Hands on experience in Java/J2EE development as well as associated technologies.
• Previous or current experience or background with C#/.Net technologies
• Design Patterns and any mainstream application server e.g. Tomcat, Weblogic.
• Should have strong written and verbal communication skills.

In addition to competitive salary and benefits the position also offers the following;
• A 7.5 hour work day and no weekends required.
• Overtime pay even for SALARIED employees, like this position.
• An Employee Share Accumulation plan (matches 25% first year, 33% second year, 50% third year and each year after).
• A Guaranteed pension plan.
• 50% Discount on all the company products and services (on average savings of up to $5000/yr)
• Free Parking.
